00031 template <class Priority>
00032 class ListElement {
00033    public:
00034         
00036      ListElement <Priority> *next;
00037

00045 // ListElement::ListElement
00052 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053      ListElement(void *itemPtr, Priority sortKey){
00054        item = itemPtr;
00055        key = sortKey;
00056        next = NULL;     // assume we'll put it at the end of the list 
00057      };

00067 template <class Priority>
00068 class List {
00069   public:
00070 
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 // List::List
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     List(){ 
00078       first = last = NULL; 
00079     };
00080   
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // List::~List
00090 //----------------------------------------------------------------------   
00091     ~List(){ 
00092       while (Remove() != NULL)
00093         ;        // delete all the list elements
00094     };
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 // List::Prepend
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108     void Prepend(void *item){
00109       ListElement<Priority> *element = new ListElement<Priority>(item, 0);
00110 
00111       if (IsEmpty()) {          // list is empty
00112         first = element;
00113         last = element;
00114       } else {                  // else put it before first
00115         element->next = first;
00116         first = element;
00117       }
00118     };
00119     
00120  
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 // List::Append
00132 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00133     void Append(void *item){
00134       
00135       ListElement<Priority> *element = new ListElement<Priority>(item,(Priority) 0);
00136       
00137       if (IsEmpty()) {          // list is empty
00138         first = element;
00139         last = element;
00140       } else {                  // else put it after last
00141         last->next = element;
00142         last = element;
00143       }
00144     }; 
00145     
00146 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 // List::Remove
00153 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00154     void *Remove(){
00155       return SortedRemove(NULL);  // Same as SortedRemove, but ignore the key
00156     }
00157     ;
00158  
00159 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 //----------------------------------------------------------------------   
00169     void Mapcar(VoidFunctionPtr func){
00170       for (ListElement<Priority> *ptr = first; ptr != NULL; ptr = ptr->next) {
00171         DEBUG('l', "In mapcar, about to invoke %x(%x)\n", func, ptr->item);
00172         (*func)((int)ptr->item);
00173       }
00174     };  
00175 
00176 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 // List::IsEmpty
00179 //----------------------------------------------------------------------   
00180     bool IsEmpty(){ 
00181       if (first == NULL)
00182         return true;
00183       else
00184         return false; 
00185     };  
00186  
00187 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00188 // List::SortedInsert
00201 //----------------------------------------------------------------------  
00202     void SortedInsert(void *item, Priority sortKey){
00203       ListElement<Priority> *element = new ListElement<Priority>(item, sortKey);
00204       
00205       ListElement<Priority> *ptr;               // keep track
00206       
00207       if (IsEmpty()) {  // if list is empty, put
00208         first = element;
00209         last = element;
00210       } else if (sortKey < first->key) {        
00211         // item goes on front of list
00212         element->next = first;
00213         first = element;
00214       } else {          // look for first elt in list bigger than item
00215         for (ptr = first; ptr->next != NULL; ptr = ptr->next) {
00216           if (sortKey < ptr->next->key) {
00217             element->next = ptr->next;
00218             ptr->next = element;
00219             return;
00220           }
00221         }
00222         last->next = element;           // item goes at end of list
00223         last = element;
00224       }
00225       
00226     };  
00227     
00228   
00229 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00230 // List::SortedRemove
00241 //----------------------------------------------------------------------  
00242    
00243     void *SortedRemove(Priority *keyPtr){
00244       ListElement<Priority> *element = first;
00245       void *thing;
00246       
00247       if (IsEmpty()) 
00248         return NULL;
00249 
00250       ASSERT(first != first->next);
00251       
00252       thing = first->item;
00253       if (first == last) {      // list had one item, now has none 
00254         first = NULL;
00255         last = NULL;
00256       } else {
00257         first = element->next;
00258       }
00259       if (keyPtr != NULL)
00260         *keyPtr = element->key;
00261       delete element;
00262       return thing;
00263     };    
00264 
00265     // Search for an element in the list
00266     bool Search(void *item){
00267       ListElement<Priority> *element = first;
00268       
00269       if (IsEmpty()) {
00270         return false;
00271       }
00272       else {   
00273         while ((element != last) && (element->item != item)) {
00274           element = element->next;
00275         }
00276         return (element->item == item);
00277       }
00278     } ;
00279     
00280     // Remove the specified item from the list
00281     void RemoveItem(void *item){
00282       void *temp;
00283       while ((temp=this->Remove()) != item) this->Append(temp);
00284     };
00285 
00286   ListElement<Priority> *getFirst(void) {return first;}
00287  private:
00289     ListElement<Priority> *first;
00291     ListElement<Priority>  *last;               
00292 };
